name: Groovy Kitchen
description:
You have just opened a restaurant, so you have to start from rock bottom with simple recipes in order to one day make it to the stars, all with the help of nimble fingers, accurate typing and feeling the groove! 

As of now, however, there are only two available recipes 

Made this by myself as a part of the 48h Mix and Game Jam 2020, where the theme was "Mixing genres" - this instance is clearly a mix between the Rhythm- and Typing-genres, but I would've put more effort into the cooking and growing of a restaurant aspects if I had more time, as well as made the songs go on for longer. 

All the borrowed assets are attributed in the zip
